CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Summertime! Taking it easy by the cool pool at North Park is winsome Mrs. Velma Robinson, who pauses to dream a bit about her hubby, who is serving with Uncle Sam's Army overseas. Her smile, her outfit, hairdo-well how 'bout it?"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Velma Robinson wearing tropical shirt, pants, and flower in hair, holding stick and crouching on rock beside pond in North Park
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trees--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.North Park.Women--Portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
